value: Building 3A 650 Church St, Richmond, 3121, VIC, Australia

2273 - Carpets and Rugs Summary > SHAW CONTRACT GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover carpets and rugs. The company is involved in the import and export of goods. SHAW CONTRACT GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Richmond, Victoria. It is headed by managing director Paul Matthew Mccosker. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $33.33 million. Its net profit totalled $588,000. SHAW CONTRACT GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the manufacturing industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
